org.projekt.rssreader.gui

Class MainWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.projekt.rssreader.gui.MainWindow

  • public class MainWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    The main window and shell of the reader All of the GUI was made using SWT/JFace
    See Also:
    SWT, JFace

        public void setSettings(java.lang.String defaultUrl,
               boolean isLoadAtStart)
        Sets the current settings with values in the parameters
        Parameters:
        defaultUrl - the default URL loaded in the browser at startup and reset with New
        isLoadAtStart - boolean value that decides if the default channel groups should be loaded at startup
